title: Our Morning Farm Routine With Horses Goats And Other Animals

tasks.task: Morning routine for horses and barn chores
subtasks: Feeding horses and checking their stalls
Ensuring pens and stalls are secure
Checking on goats and managing their access
Cleaning up the barn and stalls
Preparing for evening feed and care
Considering improvements for the wash area
Organizing storage and shelving
Addressing safety concerns for animals

tasks.task: Caring for the cat (Ellie and Ollie)
subtasks: Ensuring the safety and well-being of the indoor cat
Managing the outdoor cat's environment
Checking horse comfort and health
Addressing any immediate needs or concerns
Adapting to new living arrangements for the horses
Ensuring a smooth transition for the horses
Observing and adjusting to the horses' behavior
Addressing social dynamics between horses
